reportUpToTheMinute.title: Report Up to the Minute
reportUpToTheMinute.description: Hold down the time tracking button to report your time to the minute. You can also set in the settings the increments in which you want to track your time.

territories.title: Always Have Territories
territories.description: If your territory servant uses TerritoryOffline, you can ask them to send you your territories. This allows you to view them on the map at any time and manage the Do Not Visit addresses.

welcome.feature1: Report your service throughout the month
welcome.feature2: Set hourly goals and track your progress
welcome.feature3: Send your report at the end of the month
welcome.feature4: Receive territories and view them on the map

service.noDayChosenDesc: Select a day to edit or add reports
service.goalsDesc: You can set a monthly and yearly hourly goal. The app will show you your progress.
service.goalsInfo: Tap on the number of hours in the report overview to switch between the display of the monthly/yearly goal.
service.studiesDesc: Enter the number of different people with whom you study the Bible so that they appear in your report.
service.studiesInfo: Tap the study icon (person) in the report overview to change the number of studies.
service.explainDurationTrimmer: Your reported hours will be rounded off and the remaining time carried over to the next month.

territories.title: Territories
territories.noTerritoriesDesc: If your territory servant uses TerritoryOffline, you can add your territories here
territories.feature1: Receive territories via link from your territory servant
territories.feature2: View your territory on detailed maps
territories.feature3: Track your location and see where you've been
territories.giveBackConfirmation: Do you really want to return this territory?
territories.reallyDeleteVisitBan: Do you really want to delete this address?
territories.deleteConfirmation: Do you really want to delete this territory?
territories.returnInfoText: To return your territory, please send it back to your territory servant. Once you tap 'Complete', it will be automatically removed from your list of territories.
territories.wrongFileType: Incorrect file type! Please import a file with the '.territory' extension

actions.reallyReset: Do you really want to reset the app?

localNotifications.monthlyReminderBody: It's that time again! Your report is waiting to be sent ðŸ“®

errors.inputShouldBeNumber: Error! The input must be a number.

tips.0: You can change the language in the settings.
tips.1: Tap on the number of hours in the report overview to switch between the display of the monthly/annual target.
tips.2: In the report overview, tap the study icon (person) to change the number of studies.
tips.3: You can set a monthly and annual hourly target. The app shows you your progress.
tips.4: Your reported hours are rounded off and the remaining time is carried over to the next month.
